name: Baking Bad
description:
With customer numbers dwindling, your bakery has been struggling to survive. In a last ditch effort, you decide to experiment with your normal cookie recipe to create the most delicious and addictive cookies known to mankind. Something goes horribly wrong and the dough seems to take on a life of its own. Before long the bakery is overrun by monstrous cookies on the hunt for world domination.

Made for the GMTK 2020 Jam (Out of Control)

Acknowledgements
- ZapSplat for sounds
